text: Janusz Bogdan Kupcewicz (9 December 1955 – 4 July 2022) was a Polish professional footballer. He played as a midfielder.#TuZaczynałem – Janusz Kupcewicz wmzpn.pl He was seen as one of the best Polish players during his time. He played with the Poland national football team from 1976 to 1983, making twenty appearances. He played for the team during the 1982 World Cup. Kupcewicz died on 4 July 2022 in Gdańsk, Poland from a stroke caused by diabetes at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Polish footballers Category:Polish football managers
title: Janusz Kupcewicz
